roleset.name: beat soundly

example.name: passive = adjective
example.text: He adds: ``The junk market has witnessed some trouble and now some people think that if the equity market gets creamed [*-1] that means the economy will be terrible and that's bad for junk.

roleset.note: Not sure if the active could occur, actually.

example.name: mmm, now that's fine dining
example.text: John creamed some weenies for Thanksgiving dinner.
